name: William CASSIDY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Cassidy v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: William CASSIDY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of November, 1996, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
685 A.2d 992
William CASSIDY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 7, 1996.
